Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.name: functions
Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.abstract: Functions that resides in this module in Javascript environment.

Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.name: findFunction(name:)
Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.abstract: Finding the module function of the given name.

Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.name: scripts()
Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.abstract: The javascript glue scripts that is going to be injected in WKWebview for communicating with this Module its contained ModuleFunctions. Should always add ontop of the scripts generated by super method.

Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html#/s:1.name: webAppLoadFailed
Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html#/s:1.abstract: A callback listener when Drive failed to load from the server in case of network issue.

Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html#/s:1.name: setCustomURLPath(path:)
Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html#/s:1.abstract: Set navigation path. “path” will be concatenated as follows: “https://#${path}”.

Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html#/s:1.name: setLastServerAddressUpdatedCallback(_:)
Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html#/s:1.abstract: Set LastServerAddressUpdated callback listener. Such event is sent by MyGeotab to notify impelementor that a designated “server address” should be used for future launches. Implementor should save the new server address in persistent storage. In the future launches, app should set the MyGeotabSdkConfig.serverAddress with the stored new address before creating an instance of MyGeotabViewController. Note such address is not the same as the counterparty one in DriveViewController.

Classes/MyGeotabSdkConfig.html#/s:15Geot.name: serverAddress
Classes/MyGeotabSdkConfig.html#/s:15Geot.abstract: The server address to which MyGeotab is going to launch from.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: isCharging
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Indicates whether phone is in charging state.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: webAppLoadFailed
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: A callback listener when Drive failed to load from the server in case of network issue.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: cancelLogin()
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Cancelling a login request. When user clicked Add CoDriver in Drive, but decided not to proceed and want to cancel that request, this function must be called. What this function do is to navigate the Drive to the previously non-login page. If the login request is main driver login, calling this function will result dismissing the DriveViewController.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setSpeechEngine(speechEngine:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set a custom speech Engine to replace the default one comes with the SDK.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setSession(credentialResult:isCoDriver:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set a new Geotab session for driver or co-driver. Setting a new session means adding a new driver to Drive. In case the given session is invalid, Login Required event will be triggered. See setLoginRequiredCallback for more detail.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setCustomURLPath(path:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set navigation path. “path” will be concatenated as follows: “https:///drive/default.html?#${path}”.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setDriverActionNecessaryCallback(_:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set DriverActionNecessary callback to listen for such event sent from Web Drive.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setLoginRequiredCallback(_:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set a callback to listen for session changes. That includes: no session, invalid session, session expired, co-driver login is requested.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setLastServerAddressUpdatedCallback(_:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set LastServerAddressUpdated callback listener. Such event is sent by Drive to notify impelementor that a designated “server address” should be used for future launches. Implementor should save the new server address in persistent storage. In the future launches, app should set the DriveSdkConfig.serverAddress with the stored new address before creating an instance of DriveViewController. Note such address is not the same as the counterparty one in MyGeotabViewController.

Classes/DriveSdkConfig.html#/s:15GeotabM.name: serverAddress
Classes/DriveSdkConfig.html#/s:15GeotabM.abstract: The server address to which Drive is going to launch from.

Classes/DriveViewController.html.name: DriveViewController
Classes/DriveViewController.html.abstract: Drive’s View Controller and API interface. Everthing you need to launch a Drive. Only one instance should be created.

Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html.name: MyGeotabViewController
Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html.abstract: MyGeotab’s View Controller and API interface. Everthing you need to launch a MyGeotab. Only one instance should be created.

Classes/ModuleFunction.html.name: ModuleFunction
Classes/ModuleFunction.html.abstract: Module Function. This class is used for creating a Geotab Module function in the WKWebview/Javascript environment. Mostly intended for Drive and MyGeotab.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
